review: Product arrived on time as promised. Well packaged. Bought 2. One was for my son . Have now ordered a 3rd one for another large TV in the house. Excellent product with a great price for what it does. We have 1 of the major dish networks and they will not allow us to stream Netflix as it is in direct competition to what they offer at a much higher price. I highly recommend this product.

review: We picked one up for christmas and already its unshackled the way we watch our media.  No longer as we required to convert our content to be used in a certain other media center device.  Instead Chromecast lets us enjoy our media directly from our little archive that we maintain on our home network.That's not to say it's ready to go right out of the box, you will need to do some homework and find the appropriate apps and such to make use with the Chromecast.
